ledindicators: - 10 GbE(reserved), Status, LAN, eSATA(reserved), hard drives
usb: - 2 x USB 3.0 port (rear) - 4 x USB 2.0 port (rear) - Support USB pen drive, USB hub, and USB UPS etc.
lcdpanel: - Mono-LCD display with backlight - Enter button, Select button for configuration
cpu: - Processor Dual Core Intel Core i3-2120 Processor 3.3 GHz
